#summary Describes project Embox's usage on Virtex-5 LXT FPGA ML505 Evaluation Platform

= HOW-TO =

 # Install [ftp://gaisler.com/gaisler.com/grmon/grmon-eval-1.1.44.tar.gz grmon-eval]
 # grmon-eval -nb -xilusb -ni
{{{
grlib> flash unlock all
grlib> flash erase 0 0x8000
grlib> flash load path/embox
grlib> verify path/embox
grlib> quit
}}}
